ovdesc.p: The CATEG.ENT.FWD file enables all forward valued Category Entries relating to a Category to be displayed.
This is an internal file and may only be used for display purposes.

desc.p: Contains a list of ids of Category entries from the CATEG.ENTRY file.
All forward valued category entries raised by value dated accounting related to a Category will appear here.
Help Text for this field is unavailable. Please refer to the T24 User Guides for further information.
Identifies the Category to which the entries relate.
